title: Convert to Function — as_fn
text: function converts one-sided formula function. simplified version rlang::as_function.

title: Convert to Function — as_fn
text: x one-sided formula function. .str = TRUE, also accepts string. ... Must remain empty.

title: Function Namespace — fn-ns
text: x function, list functions, string/character vector function name(s). ... empty dots.

title: Function Namespace — fn-ns
text: namespace list namespaces function input.

title: Function Namespace — fn-ns
code: fn_ns(mean) #> <environment: namespace:base> fn_ns("mean") #> <environment: namespace:base> fn_ns(c("mean", var)) #> [[1]] #> <environment: namespace:base> #>  #> [[2]] #> <environment: namespace:stats> #>

title: Function from Name — fn_from_chr
text: Function Name

title: Function from Name — fn_from_chr
text: x string character vector. Also accepts input type "ns:::fn". ... Empty dots. stop_not_found FALSE (default) returns NULL function found. error TRUE.

title: Function from Name — fn_from_chr
text: function list functions.

text: Get Namespace Functions

title: Get Namespace Functions — ns_get_fns
text: x function, string, environment. exports_only TRUE (default), returns exported functions. FALSE, private ones included .
